title: Building PowerShell GUIs with HTML
summary:
Good evening powershellers!

We are going to get this group rolling again, and to start it off, Micah Rairdon will be giving a presentation of creating GUIs for PowerShell using HTML.  There are a few ways out there I have seen to do this, but I have never heard of using HTML so this should be an interesting demo.  I’m really looking forward to it.

Next, if time permits I will give a small talk on using Classes in PowerShell, this is new to V5, but it should help bridge the gap a lot of devs have using PowerShell.

Thanks everyone, hope to see you all there.

Thomas Malkewitz | @dotps1
location: 775 – 36th St SE, Grand Rapids 49548, Building 3 (Education Center), Inspiration Conference Room
